00035    template <int NAtom>
00036    class Group
00037    {
00038 
00039    public: 
00040 
00044       Group()
00045        : typeId_(-1),
00046          isActive_(true)
00047       {
00048          for (int i=0; i < NAtom; ++i) {
00049             atoms_[i] = 0;
00050          }
00051       }
00052             
00058       Atom& atom(int i)
00059       { return *atoms_[i]; }
00060     
00066       const Atom& atom(int i) const
00067       { return *atoms_[i]; }
00068     
00072       int typeId() const
00073       { return typeId_; }
00074    
00082       bool isActive() const
00083       { return isActive_; }
00084    
00091       void setAtom(int i, Atom &atom)
00092       { atoms_[i] = &atom; }
00093      
00099       void setTypeId(int typeId)
00100       { typeId_ = typeId; }
00101    
00107       void setIsActive(bool isActive)
00108       { isActive_ = isActive; }
00109    
00110    private:
00111       
00113       Atom*  atoms_[NAtom];
00114    
00116       int    typeId_;
00117    
00119       bool   isActive_;
00120    
00121    };

00123 }
